That doesn't help;please explain your problem in detail.
I only get black screen..why??

Well,I didn't know what HD Loader is,looked it up in Wikipedia,and found this:
"...The HD Loader software does not require an original Sony hard drive to function properly; most generic IDE drives can be attached to the PS2 using a Sony Ethernet adapter and formatted for use by the software. This does not, however, allow the use of a non-Sony hard drive with PS2 games such as Final Fantasy XI, which require the (official) HDD peripheral..."
The same issue must apply for FFXII
.
There are patches for HD Loader to allow you to play incompatible games;you should search the net to find one.

PCSX2_ONLY_SUPPORTS PS2 games,that's why FFIX (PS1) can't be played, and ePSXe_ONLY_SUPPORTS PS1 CDs,so FFXII(PS2) is incompatible.If you can't play it in PCSX2,try another CDVD plug-in (and play around with the plugins and their settings generally) until it works.You can find PCSX2 along with a nice selection of plugins here on TPB (just use the search function).
